dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, did you happen to see the latest from Akorda today?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, did you happen to see the latest from Akorda today?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, I think so. Was it about President Tokayev?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, I think so. Was it about President Tokayev?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly! He actually sent a pretty significant congratulatory message.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly! He actually sent a pretty significant congratulatory message.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev congratulated the Grand Duke of Luxembourg, according to Akorda. Tokayev sent a congratulatory telegram to Grand Duke Henri on the occasion of Luxembourg's National Day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, to, um, Grand Duke Henri of Luxembourg, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, to, um, Grand Duke Henri of Luxembourg, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev sent a congratulatory telegram to Grand Duke Henri on the occasion of Luxembourg's National Day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's the one! For Luxembourg's National Day, no less.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's the one! For Luxembourg's National Day, no less.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev sent a congratulatory telegram to Grand Duke Henri on the occasion of Luxembourg's National Day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, right. And in the message, like, he really emphasized the unity there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, right. And in the message, like, he really emphasized the unity there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In his message, the Head of State emphasized that this holiday symbolizes the unity and shared aspirations of the people of Luxembourg...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the unity and, uh, shared aspirations of the people, which is nice.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the unity and, uh, shared aspirations of the people, which is nice.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In his message, the Head of State emphasized that this holiday symbolizes the unity and shared aspirations of the people of Luxembourg...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Mmm-hmm. And, um, also their impressive achievements, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mmm-hmm. And, um, also their impressive achievements, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...as well as the country™s significant achievements in finance, digital innovation, and green technologies,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. They mentioned finance, [overlaps] digital innovation...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. They mentioned finance, digital innovation...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the country™s significant achievements in finance, digital innovation, and green technologies,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Oh, and green technologies too! Like, a pretty forward-thinking list.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, and green technologies too! Like, a pretty forward-thinking list.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the country™s significant achievements in finance, digital innovation, and green technologies,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. It's, uh, quite a testament to their progress, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. It's, uh, quite a testament to their progress, honestly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And, you know, he wished Grand Duke Henri success in his duties.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And, you know, he wished Grand Duke Henri success in his duties.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President of Kazakhstan wished Grand Duke Henri success in his responsible duties...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And also continued prosperity for the friendly people of Luxembourg.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And also continued prosperity for the friendly people of Luxembourg.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...and the friendly people of Luxembourg continued prosperity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Just a really solid, positive diplomatic exchange, then.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Just a really solid, positive diplomatic exchange, then.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it really sounds like it. Good to see that kind of, um, connection.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it really sounds like it. Good to see that kind of, um, connection.
